## Physical indicators

### Cold pool index
```{r, cold_pool}
test <- ecodata::cold_pool
NEesp::render_indicator(test)
```

### Gulf Stream Index
```{r, gsi}
test <- ecodata::gsi %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Time = Time %>%
    stringr::str_trunc(width = 4, ellipsis = "") %>%
    as.numeric())
NEesp::render_indicator(test)
```

### North Atlantic Oscillation
```{r, nao}
test <- ecodata::nao
NEesp::render_indicator(test)
```

### Chlorophyll
```{r, chl}
test <- ecodata::chl_pp %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Var = Var %>%
    stringr::str_replace_all("_", "\n") %>%
    stringr::str_replace_all(" ", "\n")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(stringr::str_detect(Var, "ANNUAL")) %>% # only annual indices
  dplyr::mutate(Time = Time %>%
    stringr::str_replace("A_", "") %>%
    as.numeric())
NEesp::render_indicator(test)

# data_prep(stock, test, lag = params$lag) %>% knitr::kable()
```
